pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:5.1: 10. The training rule on exchanging what belongs to an individual
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:6.2: At that time the nun Thullanandā was a learned reciter, and she was confident and skilled at giving teachings.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:6.4: Just then the precincts of Thullanandā’s dwelling were falling apart.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:6.7: and she replied, “I don’t have a donor, nor do I have a worker.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:6.8: Then, after collecting voluntary contributions for the precincts of Thullanandā’s dwelling, the people gave the collected requisites to Thullanandā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:6.9: But even though she had asked for them, Thullanandā exchanged those requisites for tonics, which she then used.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:7.1: When the people found out about this, they complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:7.2: “When personal requisites are designated for a specific purpose and were asked for, how could the nun Thullanandā exchange them for something else?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:7.3: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:7.6: When personal requisites are designated for a specific purpose and were asked for, how could the nun Thullanandā exchange them for something else?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:7.7: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:7.8: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:8.1: ‘When a personal requisite is designated for a specific purpose and was asked for, if a nun exchanges it for something else, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:9.4: The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:10.1: A […] requisite is designated for a specific purpose:
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:10.2: it was given for a specific purpose.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:11.2: belonging to an individual nun, not to the Order, not to a group.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:12.2: that she had asked for herself.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:13.2: if, apart from the purpose for which it was given, she exchanges it for something else, then the effort constitutes wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:13.3: When she obtains it, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:13.4: It is to be relinquished to the Order of nuns, a group, or an individual nun.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:13.5: To be expanded as in Nuns’ Relinquishment 1, {MS.2.2431-2.2435}, with appropriate substitutions.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:13.6: ‘Venerables, this thing which I got in exchange for a personal requisite that was designated for a specific purpose and that had been asked for is to be relinquished. I relinquish it to the Order.’ …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:14.1: If it is for a specific purpose and she perceives that it is for a specific purpose, and she exchanges it for something else, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:14.2: If it is for a specific purpose, but she is unsure if it is, and she exchanges it for something else, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:14.3: If it is for a specific purpose, but she does not perceive that it is for a specific purpose, and she exchanges it for something else, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:14.4: When she receives in return what had been relinquished, it is to be used in accordance with the intention of the donors.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:15.1: If it is not for a specific purpose, but she perceives that it is for a specific purpose, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:15.2: If it is not for a specific purpose, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:15.3: If it is not for a specific purpose, and she does not perceive that it is for a specific purpose, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:16.2: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:17.1: The tenth training rule is finished.
